cast.overview: Buenos Aires, Argentina, 1971. Carlos Robledo Puch is a 19-year-old boy with an angelic face, but a vocational thief as well, who acts ruthlessly, without remorse. When he meets Ramón, they follow together a dark path of crime and death.
cast.title: El Angel

details.biography: Lorenzo Ferro, also known as Toto Ferro, was born on November 9, 1998 in Buenos Aires, Argentina. He is an Argentine actor who rose to fame for his debut film role in the Argentine film The Angel (2018), which is a biographical crime drama that is inspired by the true story of Argentine serial killer Carlos Robledo Puch. He is the son of Argentine actor Rafael Ferro.
details.name: Lorenzo Ferro
